name: Days Gone Bye
summary: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma into a world terrorized by the walking dead. Morgan and Duane, whom he meets along the way, help teach Rick the new rules for survival.

name: Guts
summary: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers. The group dynamic devolves from accusations to violence, as Rick must confront an enemy far more dangerous than the undead.

name: Tell It to the Frogs
summary: Rick makes a decision to go back to Atlanta to retrieve the bag of guns and save a man's life. Lori and Shane must deal with the surprising return of someone they thought was dead.

name: Vatos
summary: Rick's mission to Atlanta is jeopardized when things go awry. Jim becomes unhinged in camp.

name: Wildfire
summary: Rick leads the group to the CDC after the attack. Jim must make a terrible life and death decision

name: TS-19
summary: Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor. But all is not what it seems in their newfound haven.

name: What Lies Ahead
summary: After the CDC explosion, the survivors are still on the move when they encounter a herd of walkers that separates one of their own, leading them to a possible safe haven.

name: Bloodletting
summary: Coming to the aid of another, Rick discovers a possible safe haven. Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get badly needed medical supplies.

name: Save the Last One
summary: The group desperately awaits Shane's return. Shane finds himself trapped in a school, surrounded by the undead. Daryl and Andrea search for someone in the woods.

name: Cherokee Rose
summary: Shane makes a deadly sacrifice which leads to unusual behavior and self-distancing. The rest of the group tries to hang on somewhere between living to die and dying to live.

name: Chupacabra
summary: Glenn, the only one breaking barriers between both groups, knows far too much for his comfort level. Daryl finds a sign of life and, in his delirium, tries to make it back to the farm alive.

name: Secrets
summary: Secrets are told and secrets are revealed. Hershel refuses to acknowledge the world’s new reality. Andrea comes out of her shell. Everyone is becoming more and more aware that “everything is food for something.”

name: Pretty Much Dead Already
summary: Hershel sets a deadline. All secrets are out in the open. Glenn stands up for himself and Shane takes charge.

name: Nebraska
summary: Rick and the others try to restore order in the aftermath of a terrible discovery. Hershel takes up an old habit and disappears, Rick and Glenn must follow him into town.

name: Triggerfinger
summary: Trapped, Rick, Hershel and Glenn fight to survive against new foes, both dead and alive. Shane finds Lori in danger on the road and makes it his mission to bring her back to the farm.

name: 18 Miles Out
summary: Rick and Shane come into conflict over the fate of an outsider. Andrea helps Hershel's youngest daughter face a crucial decision.

name: Judge, Jury, Executioner
summary: Rick sides with Shane on an important decision, causing Dale to worry that the group is losing its humanity. Carl's actions have unintended consequences on the group.

name: Better Angels
summary: The group learns that someone dangerous may be on the loose near the farm. As night falls, Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn comb the woods to handle the situation and keep the group safe.

name: Beside the Dying Fire
summary: Rick and Carl return from the woods to find the farm in jeopardy. The group is split up in the ensuing chaos. With things looking grim, Rick’s leadership is questioned.

name: Seed
summary: With the world growing increasingly more dangerous and Lori’s pregnancy advancing, Rick discovers a potentially safe haven. But first he must secure the premises, pushing his group to its limit.

name: Sick
summary: After a traumatic event, a life hangs in the balance. Complicating matters, the group must also deal with a potential threat to their new surroundings.

name: Walk with Me
summary: After witnessing an accident, Andrea and Michonne are introduced to a new community of survivors. As conflicts arise with their new acquaintances, a decision must be made.

name: Killer Within
summary: The group is severed and lives are put in jeopardy. In Woodbury, Merle has a request for the Governor.

name: Say the Word
summary: After another loss, Rick struggles. Michonne remains suspicious of the Governor as he throws a party with a unique twist for the people of Woodbury.

name: Hounded
summary: As Andrea grows closer to the Governor, Michonne makes a decision about Woodbury. Glenn and Maggie go on a run. Rick struggles.

name: When the Dead Come Knocking
summary: The Governor presses for information. A new guest arrives at the prison, forcing Rick's hand.

name: Made to Suffer
summary: Andrea steps up as the people of Woodbury are thrown into uncharted territory. At the prison, a new threat arises.

name: The Suicide King
summary: Rick tries to rescue a member of his group. Woodbury is in disarray after a recent attack. New guests raise concerns at the prison.

name: Home
summary: As the group debates their next course of action, Rick wanders after a lost friend. Daryl and Merle question their choices. The Governor restores order in Woodbury and makes plans to punish those responsible.

name: I Ain't a Judas
summary: Their security threatened, Rick and the group must make a choice. With Woodbury in a police state, Andrea grows uneasy.

name: Clear
summary: Realizing they are heavily outgunned against the Governor's forces, Rick leads an expedition to get more weapons.

name: Arrow on the Doorpost
summary: In an effort to prevent any more deaths, Rick and the Governor meet to come up with a peace treaty.

name: Prey
summary: The Governor chases a dissenter who fled Woodbury. While the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his upcoming plans.

name: This Sorrowful Life
summary: Rick and the group are faced with a serious problem. If they want a truce with the Governor, they will have to make a huge sacrifice.

name: Welcome to the Tombs
summary: Rick and the group have to seriously consider if the prison is worth defending as the Governor's impending attack looms over their heads.

name: 30 Days Without an Accident
summary: Rick and the group are as close to an ideal life as possible at the prison. Will they be able to hold on to humanity in the face of a new evil?

name: Infected
summary: As the group faces a brand new enemy, Rick and the others must fight to protect the livelihood they worked so hard to create at the prison.

name: Isolation
summary: As one group leaves the prison in search for supplies at a local college, those who stay must deal with recent losses while preserving what remains.

name: Indifference
summary: While on a supplies mission to a local college, members of the group run into multiple hurdles. Things at the prison are getting worse.

name: Internment
summary: Multiple enemies put pressure on Rick and the group. Could this finally be the breaking point for the survivors and the prison?

name: Live Bait
summary: A familiar face returns as each member of the group struggles to find his or her humanity in a world of constant threats.

name: Dead Weight
summary: A new and scary chapter is unfolding at a camp outside the prison. Will peace be attainable with the addition of new members?

name: Too Far Gone
summary: Just when everything started to calm down at the prison, Rick and his group now face imminent danger and destruction. This time, they might not win.

name: After
summary: As Rick deals with old wounds, members of the prison have to come to terms with their new environment and ask themselves if survival alone is enough.

name: Inmates
summary: The group encounters many obstacles in their quest to find stability and safety, but sometimes all they have to guide them is hope.

name: Claimed
summary: The group encounters many obstacles in their quest to find stability and safety, but sometimes all they have to guide them is hope.

name: Still
summary: Faced with the day-to-day survival of life outside shelter, a simple request by someone in the group leads to a bizarre but enlightening mission.

name: Alone
summary: As one group finds what may be an ideal shelter, another group comes to realize that the best protection comes from those around them.

name: The Grove
summary: After finding an idyllic place to establish a new shelter, the group starts to question whether it is possible to go back to the way things were.

name: Us
summary: However brutal some survivors believe they must be to stay alive, we get to see that faith can sometimes be the strongest survival tool.

name: A
summary: As multiple paths collide, Rick comes face to face with sheer brutality. Will he and the group have what it takes to survive?

name: No Sanctuary
summary: The true motives of the Terminans come to light when Rick and the others end up in a vulnerable situation.

name: Strangers
summary: With supplies running low and not knowing whether to trust the people around them, Rick leads a mission where the risk might not be worth the reward.

name: Four Walls and a Roof
summary: Rick and the group find themselves pitted against some very nasty people, but they might just have a plan to gain the upper hand.

name: Slabtown
summary: In this episode, we get to meet a whole group of other survivors, but what looks safe and nice on the outside has a bit of a dark side.

name: Self Help
summary: A new set of issues confront our group while on a mission. Will they be able to push through and survive these challenges? Or better yet, each other?

name: Consumed
summary: Cautiously, members of our group must venture into a familiar location on a heroic rescue mission. It's a huge stage, but so are the stakes.

name: Crossed
summary: Between holding down the church and going on a rescue mission, our group is spread pretty thin. Is this going to be the breaking point?

name: Coda
summary: Rick seeks a peaceful agreement when rules and morals are tossed aside by new enemies.

name: What Happened and What's Going On
summary: After the recent trials the group has faced, a slight detour could be the solution they've been searching for.

name: Them
summary: Life on the road has left the group beaten and beleaguered. Will they be able to trudge along? Are they even the same people they once were?

name: The Distance
summary: After a spectacular storm, Rick and the group meet a seemingly friendly person.

name: Remember
summary: Molding into a new lifestyle is proving difficult for the group. Has life on the road proven too treacherous to go back to who they once were?

name: Forget
summary: Rick and the group continue to acclimate to their new surroundings. Will they be able to go back to normalcy? Better yet, what is normal now?

name: Spend
summary: While trying to secure their new home, Rick and his group face many challenges, some life threatening. Is this really the utopia it seems to be?

name: Try
summary: The group realizes that sheltered life might not be possible as life within the walls starts to mimic life outside. Will these setbacks break Rick?

name: Conquer
summary: Daryl experiences trouble on a run while Rick and his group continue to feel like outsiders in Alexandria, where trouble is creeping into the gates.

name: First Time Again
summary: Rick and the others have a difficult time assimilating into Alexandria; a new threat arises that could bring the group closer together.

name: JSS
summary: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.

name: Thank You
summary: Rick and his group get caught up in a dangerous little town on the road back to Alexandria. Meanwhile, Daryl, Sasha and Abraham continue to lead away the remaining walkers away from the safe-zone.

name: Here's Not Here
summary: A new face appears; trust issues form.

name: Now
summary: Following a number of setbacks, the mood in Alexandria grows grim for the sheltered citizens.

name: Always Accountable
summary: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha encounter many obstacles and a new threat while trying to return to Alexandria.

name: Heads Up
summary: Alexandria is finally able to begin pulling itself back together; peace is embraced between the two groups.

name: Start to Finish
summary: After having a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria yet again. Only this time, the threat might be too big to defeat.

name: No Way Out
summary: With walkers inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the group are scared, outnumbered and things are only getting worse.

name: The Next World
summary: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.

name: Knots Untie
summary: After Rick comes to the realization that Alexandria might not be as safe as he thought, decisions must be made about where to go from here.

name: Not Tomorrow Yet
summary: Rick and the group realize the only way to maintain the peace of Alexandria is to fight a new enemy. This time, though, our group might be outmatched.

name: The Same Boat
summary: With no hope of safety in Alexandria, Rick and his band of survivors soon discover a larger world with new dangers and new opportunities.

name: Twice as Far
summary: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.

name: East
summary: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.

name: Last Day on Earth
summary: In the aftermath of a tragic blow, Eugene falls captured by Dwight, a member of the Saviors, whom are hell bent on getting even with Alexandria, Negan teaches Rick and co a brutal lesson, which shows that Rick and co finally have something to fear.

name: The Day Will Come When You Won't Be
summary: Last season ended with Rick and our group kneeling helplessly before Negan and his group; what Negan does will haunt those who survive forever.

name: The Well
summary: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.

name: The Cell
summary: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.

name: Service
summary: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.

name: Go Getters
summary: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.

name: Swear
summary: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society, and this society is unlike anything seen before.

name: Sing Me a Song
summary: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.

name: Hearts Still Beating
summary: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.

name: Rock in the Road
summary: Rick is introduced to a new community.

name: New Best Friends
summary: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.

name: Hostiles and Calamities
summary: An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound.

name: Say Yes
summary: The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.

name: Bury Me Here
summary: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.

name: The Other Side
summary: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies.

name: Something They Need
summary: A group of Alexandrians embarks on a journey; one member of the group must make a heartbreaking decision.

name: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
summary: The stakes continue to grow higher as paths cross; the group enacts an intricate plan.

name: Mercy
summary: Rick and his group, along with the Kingdom and Hilltop, have banded together to bring the fight to Negan and the Saviors.

name: The Damned
summary: The plan involving Alexandrians, Kingdommers and Hilltoppers unfolds; as Rick continues to fight, he encounters a familiar face.

name: Monsters
summary: Conflict with the Saviors leads to unintended consequences for the Hilltop, the Kingdom, and Alexandria; morality proves tricky in wartime.

name: Some Guy
summary: A new weapon in the Savior arsenal proves to be a giant hurdle as fighting continues between Rick's forces and those of the Saviors.

name: The Big Scary U
summary: A close look at Negan and the lives of the Saviors during the conflict through a familiar set of eyes.

name: The King, the Widow, and Rick
summary: With things looking up for Rick and the group, an argument breaks out at the Hilltop; the consequences of the decision are life versus death.

name: Time for After
summary: Negan has to enlist the help of his lieutenants in solving a huge issue facing the Sanctuary; Rick and the group continue to enact the plan.

name: How It's Gotta Be
summary: Every story and battle from the first half of the season comes crashing together in this action-packed, emotional mid-season finale.

name: Honor
summary: Rick faces new difficulties after a battle. Meanwhile, the fight continues in other communities as core members face hard decisions.

name: The Lost and the Plunderers
summary: Groups unite their forces and converge on the Hilltop; Aaron and Enid search for allies.

name: Dead or Alive Or
summary: Daryl finds himself in bad company as his group heads to the Hilltop; Gabriel's faith gets tested.

name: The Key
summary: Hilltop's leadership faces a difficult dilemma after the arrival of unexpected visitors; Rick comes face to face with an adversary.

name: Do Not Send Us Astray
summary: Trouble arises when unexpected visitors arrive at the Hilltop and the community is thrust into action; heartbreaking discoveries are made.

name: Still Gotta Mean Something
summary: A Heaps prisoner makes a discovery; Carol searches for someone in the nearby forest; Rick and Morgan find themselves in the company of strangers.

name: Worth
summary: With the threat of the Saviors still looming, Aaron continues searching for allies; Daryl and Rosita take action and confront an old friend.

name: Wrath
summary: The communities join forces in the last stand against the Saviors as all-out war unfolds.

name: A New Beginning
summary: Rick and his group make a risky run into Washington, D.C. to search for artifacts they will need to build the civilization he and Carl envisioned.

name: The Bridge
summary: The communities join forces to restore a bridge that will facilitate communication and trade; someone is gravely injured at the construction site.

name: Warning Signs
summary: Rick's vision for the future is threatened by a mysterious disappearance that divides the work camp where the communities are building a bridge.

name: The Obliged
summary: Rick's vision of a civilized future is threatened by a sudden reckoning with past sins that remain unavenged and unforgiven.

name: What Comes After
summary: Rick is forced to face the past as he struggles to maintain the safety of the communities and protect the future he and Carl envisioned.

name: Who Are You Now?
summary: The Survivors encounter unfamiliar faces outside the safety of their community's walls and must decide whether or not this new group can be trusted.

name: Stradivarius
summary: Carol seeks out an old friend living alone in a wilderness teeming with walkers; survivors make the perilous trek to a new home.

name: Evolution
summary: A small rescue mission braves a dangerous herd in their hunt for a missing comrade, only to discover a surprising threat that could doom them all.

name: Adaptation
summary: The communities thought they could build a better future separately, but the recent loss of one of their own drives them to band together; new leaders rise when a disturbing and dangerous threat is unmasked; an escaped captive revisits his past.

name: Omega
summary: Daryl learns more about the masked tribe's leader; a search begins for two missing friends.

name: Bounty
summary: The savage group led by Alpha confronts the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter. A supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.

name: Guardians
summary: While one community struggles to ease tensions that threaten to divide from within, the true nature of another group comes into focus; a mission to rescue a friend has deadly consequences.

name: Chokepoint
summary: Daryl's daring rescue mission forces Alpha to unleash a group of her own to retrieve what belongs to her, even if the price is paid in blood; the Kingdom's plans to reunite the communities are put in jeopardy.

name: Scars
summary: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.

name: The Calm Before
summary: The fair at the Kingdom is underway, with all four communities coming together in celebration for the first time in years; while some pacts are renewed, other deals will come at a much steeper price.

name: The Storm
summary: In the aftermath of an overwhelming loss, the communities must brave a ferocious blizzard; as one group deals with an enemy from within, another is forced to make a life or death decision.

name: Lines We Cross
summary: The Oceanside group continues to train in case the Whisperers return. Tensions are high as our heroes struggle to hold onto their concept of civilization.

name: We Are the End of the World
summary: The origins of Alpha and Beta are revealed in a flashback; Alpha tries to help Lydia prepare for their journey with the dead; the Whisperers create herds.

name: Ghosts
summary: Alexandria is overcome with paranoia as the threat of the Whisperers looms; Carol struggles over her desperate urge for revenge.

name: Silence the Whisperers
summary: Negan feels the brunt of the Alexandrians' fears as their paranoia of the Whisperers grows; a safety issue catches the group off guard at Hilltop.

name: What It Always Is
summary: Supplies go missing from Hilltop; Negan is idolized by an Alexandrian; Ezekiel holds a secret.

name: Bonds
summary: Carol teams up with Daryl as they embark on a mission together; Siddiq finds it harder than expected to unravel a mystery.

name: Open Your Eyes
summary: Carol pushes boundaries that make Daryl uneasy; Alpha and Beta have reservations about someone.

name: The World Before
summary: A fight causes tensions in Oceanside while the Alexandrians set out on a high-stakes mission.
